org.openorb.compiler.doc.rtf
Class IdlToRTF

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.openorb.compiler.doc.rtf.IdlToRTF
public class IdlToRTF
extends java.lang.Object

This class takes an IDL graph and generates its RTF documentation.
